direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods generate dates relative to the current time but in opposite directions (past vs. future).
Both methods handle time generation with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods generate dates within a specified range, though 'between' is more general and can span any range.
Both methods generate dates relative to the current time, focusing on a specific age range.
Both methods involve time manipulation and generation, though 'duration' focuses on time intervals rather than specific dates.
